TEnvironment Record

Summary

Provides information about, and means to manipulate, the current environment.

Namespace: Spring.Utils
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TEnvironment = record
 end;

The TEnvironment type exposes the following members.

Properties
Show:
 NameDescription
ApplicationPath

Represents property ApplicationPath.

ApplicationVersion

Represents property ApplicationVersion.

ApplicationVersionInfo

Represents property ApplicationVersionInfo.

ApplicationVersionString

Represents property ApplicationVersionString.

CommandLine

Gets the command line for this process.

CurrentDirectory

Gets or sets the fully qualified path of the current working directory.

IsAdmin

Represents property IsAdmin.

MachineName

Gets the NetBIOS name of this local computer.

NewLine

Gets the newline string defined for this environment.

OperatingSystem

Gets a TOperatingSystem object that contains the current platform identifier and version number.

ProcessorArchitecture

Represents property ProcessorArchitecture.

ProcessorCount

Gets the number of processors on the current machine.

RegisteredOrganization

Represents property RegisteredOrganization.

RegisteredOwner

Represents property RegisteredOwner.

SystemDirectory

Gets the fully qualified path of the system directory.

TickCount

Gets the number of milliseconds elapsed since the system started.

UserDomainName

Gets the network domain name associated with the current user.

UserInteractive

Gets a value indicating whether the current process is running in user interactive mode.

UserName

Gets the user name of the person who is currently logged on to the Windows operating system.

Top
Methods
Show:
 NameDescription
ExpandEnvironmentVariables(string)

Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.

GetCommandLineArgs

Overloaded. Returns a string array containing the command-line arguments for the current process.

GetCommandLineArgs(TStrings)

Overloaded. Returns a string array containing the command-line arguments for the current process.

GetEnvironmentVariable(string)

Overloaded. Retrieves the value of an environment variable from the current process.

GetEnvironmentVariable(string,TEnvironmentVariableTarget)

Overloaded. Retrieves the value of an environment variable from the current process or from the Windows operating system registry key for the current user or local machine.

GetEnvironmentVariables(TStrings)

Overloaded. Retrieves all environment variable names and their values from the current process.

GetEnvironmentVariables(TStrings,TEnvironmentVariableTarget)

Overloaded. Retrieves the value of an environment variable from the current process or from the Windows operating system registry key for the current user or local machine.

GetFolderPath(TSpecialFolder)

Gets the path to the system special folder that is identified by the specified enumeration.

GetLogicalDrives

Overloaded. Returns an array of string containing the names of the logical drives on the current computer.

GetLogicalDrives(TStrings)

Overloaded. Represents method GetLogicalDrives(TStrings).

SetEnvironmentVariable(string,string)

Overloaded. Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process.

SetEnvironmentVariable(string,string,TEnvironmentVariableTarget)

Overloaded. Creates, modifies, or deletes an environment variable stored in the current process or in the Windows operating system registry key reserved for the current user or local machine.

Top
Remarks

Use the TEnvironment structure to retrieve information such as command-line arguments, environment variable settings.
